title.rendered: Grow With Poynt Smart Terminal: The Last Terminal You’ll Ever Need

content.rendered:
The Poynt Smart Terminal is built to give you the tools you need to thrive.

It’s more than just a sleek and secure terminal that accepts all forms of existing and emerging payments. It’s a platform that provides access to data and insights to help you succeed.

 

With a Poynt Terminal, you receive the following benefits:

  • EMV Chip Enabled

  • Wireless (Wifi Ready)

  • Apple and Samsung Pay

  • App Store for Business Tools

  • Forward Facing Display

  • Text/Email Receipt Options

  • Built-in Reporting Dashboard

Upgrade your terminal today!
